articles.title: I may never beat Ganon in The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild - Polygon
articles.description: The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom is almost here, and it may finally be time to move on from BOTW. But maybe I never will.
articles.content: Like many people I know, I have never actually finished The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild. At least, Ive never defeated Calamity Ganon, the games de facto final boss. My friends who have defeat… [+10952 chars]
